casebody.data:
MOTION DOCKET

97-728. Cleveland Police Patrolmen’s Assn. v. Cleveland.

Cuyahoga App. No. 70380. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellants’ motion for immediate stay of the judgment of the Cuyahoga County Court of Appeals,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, granted.

Pfeifer, J., dissents.
